patterns: How do I register for an event?
What is the registration process for an event?
responses: First, click on the event and open the provided link, which will redirect you to a Google Form. Fill in the required details.

patterns: What is the process to add an event?
responses: Click on the 'Add Your Event' button in the navbar and fill in the required details.

patterns: How to login into the website?
what is the login procedure into the website?
responses: On the landing page, click on the profile icon, and you will be able to log in or sign up for the website.

The website offers various events such as Kalotsava, Intent, Interface, and seminars/webinars. You can register for these events or add your own events through the website, and you will also find updates regarding these events.

patterns: Can I speak to a counselor?
responses: Yes, our department offers confidential counseling services to all students, allowing them to share their thoughts with the counselor. After classes commences the students will be alloted to the councellers
Our counselors provide support for a range of issues, including academic pressure, stress, and teaching-related concerns with lecturers.
